title: Apartments for rent across from CSUN
posting_body: ['Northridge', '9710 Zelzah Avenue, Northridge, CA, 91325', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 55', 'OR Text', '55', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'The Heights on Superior Apartment Homes For Rent!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Enjoy living in sunny Southern California at our Northridge apartments.', 'Our community boasts spacious floor plans and luxury amenities.', 'Plus, we are located across from Cal State University, Northridge so we have apartments near CSUN.', 'NMS Northridge is also close to major shopping, hiking, and dining destinations.', 'Explore our apartments for rent in the San Fernando Valley.', 'Features', '- Central AC/Heat With Nest Thermostat', '- Private Garages/Assigned Parking', '- Carpet', '- Balcony/Patio', '- Wood Flooring', '- High Vaulted Ceilings', '- Refrigerator', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Cable/Internet Ready', '- Extended Spacious Closets/Storage', '- Dishwasher', '- Gas Stove', '- Microwave', '- Modern Style Renovated Homes', '- Granite/Graphite Countertops', 'Community Amenities', '- Recreation Room', '- On-Site Management', '- Spa', '- Courtesy Patrol', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Pet Friendly', '- Controlled Access', '- Computer/Gaming Room', '- Fitness Center', '- Pool', 'Driving Directions', 'We are on the corner of Zelzah and Superior.', 'The Leasing entrance is on Zelzah at 9710 Zelzah Ave.', 'Northridge, CA. 91325', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Apartment home allows up to 2 pets per home with a $500 pet deposit per animal and a $50 monthly pet rent per animal.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent amount for applicants and 5 times the rent amount for guarantors', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'V8RDaiP30z']
